com.tapsterrock.mpx
Class MPXCurrency

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.tapsterrock.mpx.MPXCurrency
public class MPXCurrency
extends java.lang.Object

This class is used to represent the monetary amounts found in an MPX file.
